id: scenario-value-scanner-grandparent-scenarios-neighborhood-neighborhood knowledge and connection from long residence
title: Neighborhood knowledge and connection from long residence
description: Neighborhood knowledge and connection from long residence
content:
Scenario: Neighborhood knowledge and connection from long residence
    Given Margaret has lived in neighborhood for many years
    And she knows neighborhood history, patterns, and relationships
    When the neighborhood_elohim recognizes resident knowledge
    Then it should value Margaret's accumulated neighborhood wisdom
    And it should recognize long-term residents as knowledge keepers
    And her connections should be seen as neighborhood social capital
    And institutional memory should be valued and utilized
    And Margaret's knowledge should inform neighborhood decisions
    And elder residents should be recognized as neighborhood resources
